name: Blimpo Warrior 2
description:
Back in 2004 I started working on Blimpo Warrior 2, the sequel to my "VERGE" game Blimpo Warrior. This is what I managed to accomplish.

Blimpo Warrior is an RPG of sorts, but instead of random battles, there are mini-games. Gain stats and money by doing mini-games. Battle with mini-games. Everything is a mini-game.

STORY: You are the legendary Blimpo Slayer. The king has hired a new hero anyway. Find the hero and.. take his place? Then defeat the Blimpo Lord.

I stopped working on this when I got a real job back in 2006.

It's not professional. It's not polished. It's buggy. The game might crash all the time. The game has a resolution of 320x200 for some raisin. DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!!

I'm only putting this up because this work of beauty has to be experienced. It might not be for you. Get a "let's player" to play it.

The game contains midis not made by me. Some other sounds are also not made by me. Everything else was me. Engine: Multimedia Fusion 1.5

It's also the best game of all time and you'll know it once you play it.
